definition: a second confirming signature endorsing a document already signed, to add one's signature to after another's to attest authenticity
details:
noun
- a second confirming signature endorsing a document already signed
= synonyms: countersignature
- a secret word or phrase known only to a restricted group
= synonyms: parole
verb
- to add one's signature to after another's to attest authenticity
= example: to add one's signature to after another's to attest authenticity
